channel.title: Thread-5 Error [Will Rep++ if helped]
channel.description:
Hey guys I was adding 100% bank pin to my server and everything worked then i added the code in playerassistan.java for openUpBank after i added the code I logged on and opend the bank and when the bank pin interface opened my client crashed/froze and i got the this error -
[code]Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method119(client.java:9271) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8961) at client.method146(client.java:12026) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8186) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8897) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
if any1 can help please comment and I will Rep++ you if it works! Thanks, Owner Nitro

item.title: Thread-5 Error [Will Rep++ if helped]
item.dc:creator: @owner_nitro owner nitro
item.description:
@owner_nitro wrote:

Hey guys I was adding 100% bank pin to my server and everything worked then i added the code in playerassistan.java for openUpBank
after i added the code I logged on and opend the bank and when the bank pin interface opened my client crashed/froze and i got the this error -

Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method119(client.java:9271) at client.draw3dScreen(client.java:8961) at client.method146(client.java:12026) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8186) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8897) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

if any1 can help please comment and I will Rep++ you if it works!
Thanks, Owner Nitro
